name: Märchen Maze
description: Märchen Maze is a platform/shooter game and conversion of Namco's 1988 arcade game of the same name. The gameplay remains largely the same - the player takes control of Alice who must shoot bubbles at enemies to knock them off platforms. Unlike the arcade original which was in isometric perspective, Märchen Maze on the PC Engine is an overhead game. This version features different stages than the arcade game, and because of the lack of a time limit, many of the stages are much more expansive. The chequered platforms at the end of a level are static rather than moving, hopping on to them automatically takes you to the boss. Also, instead of starting from a checkpoint when you die, your lives are represented by balloons. Should Alice fall, you'll be respawned on the spot.

shot.caption: Title screen
Intro
Please don't dawdle, Alice! We're very late, indeed
First stage, featuring Tweedle-Dum and Mushrooms wearing sunglasses and smoking cigarettes... yeah
Stage 1 - the Sweets Kingdom
Just like in the arcade original, the first boss is purple witch Miyasha
Stage 2 - the Machine Kingdom, with plenty of these wind-up robots
Fell off the platform, but as long as you have any balloons left you can respawn right where you died
Giant blue robot Arumeikon is the second boss
Stage 3 - the Green Kingdom is full of slimes
3rd boss - a pair of grinning spheres (the second one is off-screen)
Stage 4 - the Ice Kingdom, and where there is ice, there are penguins!
Tanbura (Tumbler) is the fourth boss
Stage 5 - the Time Kingdom features the Cheshire Cat (this enemy didn't appear in the arcade original)
Fifth boss is Triple Heads
Stage 6 - the Water Kingdom with lots of hopping between oncoming rafts, trying to get to the safe platforms, plus you have to watch out for the cards and dragonflies
Boss #6 - mechanical swordfish Raydoc just pushed poor Alice in the water
Stage 7 - the Sky Kingdom features many Mad Hatters, and these guys hide under their hats to protect them from Alice's attacks
The boss for stage 7 is Dead Rooster
Next stage is populated by evil Alices
Stage 8 - the Mirror Kingdom has Alice clones that emerge from mirrors (they're all clad in blue- the colour of Alice's dress in most interpretations of the original books)
The boss is stage 8 is Big Tortoise - straw hat & sunglasses wearing mustachioed turtle
Last Stage - the Queen's Kingdom. There's a ton of these playing cards waiting you here, luckily while I'm on the platform they can't get me
Final boss is Queen of Hearts, of course. She attacks by generating groups of Spades
